name: Rasta Roots: The Garden Defense
description:
3 trees vs 1 gardener Fixed top down camera Objective: The trees win if one of them reaches the other end of the screen, the gardener wins if time runs out

This game was made in 48 hours at the 2023 Global Game Jam.

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/rasta-roots-garden-defense-5
